artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Mill: Covington Fabrics Corp.; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Lotus pattern on branch inside oval. Textured. Vert. Rpt 23.75"; horiz. Rpt. 13.5". Orange/gold on beige. Gold and Natural
image_copyright: © Jack Lenor Larsen%2C Inc.%2C Larsen Design Studio
text: The Larsen Design Studio incoporated African motifs and aesthetics in their designs throughout the company's long history. In 1969, Larsen designers created a group of fabrics for Covington Fabrics' Montage Collection that included White Nile, a pattern based on the leaf-shaped motifs often found in Coptic weavings.
title: White Nile
